channel.title: Animation of npc attack back
channel.description: I want to add the animation of a npc that he attacks back like here with chicken: [code]npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x037; // chicken attack[/code] 0×037 is teh attack animation of the chicken but I need some more like that..thanks!

item.title: Animation of npc attack back
item.dc:creator: @blacksh00t blacksh00t
item.description:
@blacksh00t wrote:

I want to add the animation of a npc that he attacks back like here with chicken:

npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x037; // chicken attack

0×037 is teh attack animation of the chicken but I need some more like that…thanks!
